    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Applicable<M>
    Represents a component that supports applying changes and providing a model.
    Controller
    Base class for almost all controllers
    DeleteAlert
    This class extends Alert, represents a small dialog intended to prompt the user to confirm whether they really want to delete a specific entry from a table.
    Editable<M>
    Represents an editable component that supports editing actions.
    ExaminationPerformance
    Represents the performance of a student in a specific examination.
    ExamScreenController
    Controller for the exam screen.
    ExamScreenVBox
    This class combines the UpperGridPane and the LowerGridPane to create the general exam screen in a vertical layout.
    Exitable
    Represents a component that supports cancel actions.
    LowerGridPane
    The GridPane represents the lower part of the exam screen.
    Main
     
    MainScreenController
    Controller for the main screen
    MainScreenTableView
    A TableView that displays the students with selected data.
    MainScreenVBox
    VBox layout for the main screen of the application.
    MenuBarController
    Controller for the universal menu bar.
    ScreenController
    Main application controller responsible for screen navigation.
    Startable
    Represents a component that can start or trigger a new screen event.
    Student
    Represents a student with personal data and examination performances.
    StudentScreenController
    Controller for the student screen.
    StudentScreenGridPane
    GridPane layout for displaying and editing student information.
    StudentScreenTableView
    TableView for displaying a student's examination performances.
    TableButtonHBox
    This class extends HBox, provides the Button for adding, editing, or modifying table values.
    UniversalMenuBar
    This class extends MenuBar, represents the menu bar in the upper left corner of the screen.
    UpperGridPane
    This class extends GridPane represents the upper part of the exam screen, providing fields for general data.
    WindowButtonHBox
    This class extends HBox, allows you to apply or cancel your input or changes and return to the previous screen.
